response.overview: Marian Goodman – Anti-Advertising Oil is a gripping detective drama about justice and corporate corruption. Marian Goodman, a determined lawyer, fights for the rights of ordinary people in Old Town, where a powerful corporation, ADRA Ltd., exploits citizens and damages the environment. Led by the ruthless Adam Covered, the company is accused of embezzling billions and engaging in harmful oil drilling near the Red Sea, threatening marine life. With the help of lawyers and investigative journalists, Goodman works to expose the truth and hold Covered accountable. The film offers a suspenseful, socially conscious narrative that highlights the fight against corporate greed and its impact on society and nature.
response.title: MARIAN GOODMAN - ANTI-ADVERTISING OIL
